Message.Title: Ebay will be the Enron of the internet
Message.Msg: As a fairly large seller from 2001 I can tell you that it's over for Ebay. The store closures are mounting and they will not be able to cover their tracks by using ridiculous tactics like charging a fee on shipping charges. It's a matter of time before this terrible company opens up its true books. Not to mention all the litigation that will follow due to many controversial failed systems they have implemented...starting with their tax reporting. I don't own nor do I short this stock but this is fair warning from one who has seen the destruction of this company first hand by greed and a total lack of empathy...good luck.
Get friggin real with ur SPAM. Get off this EBAY msg board you pointless americans
